Title: Relates to the labeling, marketing and safety requirements of vapor products; repealer
Summary: Relates to the labeling, marketing and safety requirements of vapor products; prohibits labeling or marketing vapor products with certain terms, designs, or imagery; prohibits marketing such products to persons under 21; establishes penalties for violating such provisions; establishes the vapor products compliance fund.
LawCode: Rpld §1399-mm-1, add Art 13-I §§1399-xx - 1399-bbb, Pub Health L; add §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to regulating vapor products; to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the vapor products compliance fund; and to repeal certain provisions of the public health law relating thereto
